labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: With this bug whenever you play a youtube video it closes the overlay lock screen.
data.expected_result: If this bug did not exist the youtube video should play and be fully viewable.
data.short_description: [Overlay] Playing a Video Embed (Twitch, Youtube) Crashes Overlay
data.steps_to_repro: - Play a game (I was playing CSGO) then - press your discord overlay lock key, and play a youtube video someone sends you.
